content: hello kitty on the photos was made from yarn vlnap lada luxus 100g/230m with a crochet hook size 4 her height is 29 cm 11 4 inches you can crochet hello kitty from any other yarn using the referenced hook for that yarn the only difference will be in height pattern is available in english basic crochet knowledge is needed as well as familiarity with making a magic_ring crocheting in rounds increasing and decreasing the pattern is easy to follow and i welcome any questions and comments thanks for looking have a wonderful day
